name: Brixx Planner Calendar
summary: Learn about .XXD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Brixx Solutions and some sections of the Brixx website are only available to users who have purchased a Brixx License.

description: Calendar used by Brixx Planner, a modeling program used for business planning; contains events and related information entered by the user; saved in a proprietary format that can only be opened with Brixx Solutions software.
